name: Doors Open & Early Bird
details: Doors open for ticket sales. Play-as-you-go electronic games available. Perfect for those who like to get settled early.

name: Main Daytime Session
details: Our primary morning session featuring standard session pricing and paper card options. A community favorite.

name: Afternoon Power Play
details: Special games like Letter X, Lucky Seven, and Treasure Hunt. High energy and quick wins.

name: Evening Gala Session
details: The main event. Progressive daub tickets and high-stakes play. Dress to win!

name: Late Night Bingo Bash
details: Fast-paced, shorter-format games for the night owls. Music, fun, and late-night luck.
